id, name, username, password, idcard, phone, email, state , ctime ,utime ,remark
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tb1.id, tb1.`name`, tb1.`condition`, tb1.intro, tb1.purpose, tb1.state, tb1.ctime, tb1.utime, tb1.remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_merge_tag WHERE state != 6 ) tb1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_user_merge_tag_map ) tb2 ON tb1.id = tb2.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_merge_tag_tag_map tb3 ON tb1.id = tb3.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_basic_tag tb4 ON tb3.basic_tag_id = tb4.id
SELECT bg.* FROM tbl_user_tag_map utm INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON (utm.`user_id`=u.id) INNER JOIN tbl_basic_tag bg ON (bg.`id`=utm.`tag_id`) WHERE u.id=#{userId} GROUP BY bg.id
SELECT bt.* FROM tbl_role_data_map rdm INNER JOIN tbl_basic_tag bt ON (bt.id=rdm.tag_id) WHERE rdm.tag_type=1 AND rdm.role_id=#{roleId} GROUP BY bt.id
SELECT a.* FROM `tbl_merge_tag` a JOIN `tbl_user_merge_tag_map` c ON ( a.`id` = c.`merge_tag_id` AND c.`user_id` = #{userId} )GROUP BY a.id
SELECT a.* FROM `tbl_merge_tag` a JOIN `tbl_role_data_map` b ON ( a.`id` = b.`tag_id` AND b.`role_id` = #{roleId} AND b.tag_type=2)GROUP BY a.id
SELECT merge_tag_id AS id,COUNT(*) AS tagNum FROM tbl_merge_tag_tag_map WHERE merge_tag_id in (#{id}) GROUP BY merge_tag_id
